1.title: Everyone Has an Opinion
1.plot: Wedding planning is in full effect for our couples - only twelve weeks left until they say "I do!" Kearsten and Tyler negotiate outfit style, and Jasmine and Tilmon try to come to an agreement on a theme. Meanwhile, Tiahna and Colin face a setback after getting some unexpected news.

2.title: Parents Just Don't Understand
2.plot: Tyler and Kearsten need help choosing the perfect wedding venue, Jasmine and her mother search for her wedding dress and Tiahna and Colin can't decide between their wedding cake options.

3.title: May the Best Man Win
3.plot: Tyler doesn't know who to pick for a best man, Jasmine and Tilmon need help choosing a hashtag and Tiahna decides between three wedding gowns.

4.title: Man Tears
4.plot: Kearsten faces an emotional dress choice as Tyler finally reveals their engagement to her family. Jasmine and Tilmon must choose a grand exit for their big day while Colin's tux of choice clashes with Tiahna's tastes.

5.title: Broken Hollywood Dreams?
5.plot: Tyler and Kearsten can't agree on their vows, should they keep it traditional or break into a rap? Jasmine and Tilmon turn their focus towards their floral centerpieces, while Tiahna decides to do a boudoir shoot to spice things up for her husband-to-be.

6.title: Speak to my Face, Girl
6.plot: Tilmon takes a stand and uninvites Jasmine tux shopping. Kearsten's father asks her an unexpected question while her and Tyler clash on wedding bands. Meanwhile, Tiahna looks to include her mother in wedding plans.

7.title: I Got Drunk, She Got Pregnant
7.plot: Tyler urges Kearsten to have her son, Carson, wear a Southern Style Romper for the big day. Meanwhile, Jasmine deals with an unhappy Tilmon and Tiahna and Colin take control of their wedding plans, starting with their flowers.

8.title: Bubble, But
8.plot: Jasmine and Tilmon debate how to make their grand reception entrance as husband and wife. Colin struggles with PDA as Tiahna sets her sights on making their beach engagement video perfect, while Tyler angers Kearston with an extravagant vehicle purchase.

9.title: His Ex, Her Bridesmaid
9.plot: Kearsten causes a stir by asking one of Tyler's ex-girlfriends to join her bridal party, just as she's choosing her bridesmaids dresses. Tiahna and Colin must tackle a signature cocktail while Jasmine and Tilmon try to choose their special moment for their wedding ceremony.

10.title: Victoria's No-So-Secret
10.plot: Tyler confesses cold feet in a heart-to-heart with his groomsman, Janet clashes with Jas in what she should wear to the wedding, while Tiahna takes a literal leap of faith while choreographing their perfect wedding-day dance.

11.title: No Time for Cold Feet
11.plot: After months of planning, and YOUR votes, the final week before the weddings is full of heartfelt moments, last minute scrambles, and some major crossroads. Be there Friday at 8pm EST / 5pm PST to find out the results of Kearsten and Tyler's Financial Future, Tiahna and Colin's Charitable Contribution, and Jasmine and Tilmon's Honeymoon.

12.title: I Do (But I Don't)
12.plot: The big day is finally here, but will Tyler and Kearsten even make it down the aisle? Jasmine and Tilmon have no choice but to roll with the punches when an unexpected change occurs. Finally, the pressure is on Tiahna and Colin but will everything go as perfectly as they had planned?

imdb.plot outline: It might be their wedding, but YOU call the shots. Help plan three couples' big days by voting on every aspect from the venue to the perfect dress. Tune in Fridays as Tamera Mowry reveals the results to the couples LIVE, only on Facebook Watch.
imdb.title: Help Us Get Married
plot: It might be their wedding, but YOU call the shots. Help plan three couples' big days by voting on every aspect from the venue to the perfect dress. Tune in Fridays as Tamera Mowry reveals the results to the couples LIVE, only on Facebook Watch.
